title: I found the best keyboard for students, and its ChatGPT shortcut proves it
description: The Logitech MX Keys S features a game-changing software feature that cements it at the top for me.

title: I paid $129 for this pen and it's spoiled every other writing utensil for me
description: If you had to treat yourself with one thing during back-to-school season, this pen from The Ridge will give you your money's worth.
